Question
========

The following is an indication of 5 individuals as to how they are ranked in terms of authoritarian behavior and social status:______________. Authoritarian behavior: 5, 1, 3, 4, 2. Social status: 2, 1, 3, 5, 4. The value of the Spearman correlation coefficient here is

Answerlist
----------

* 0.2
* 0.3
* 0.306
* 0.4

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.2: Incorrect
* 0.3: Correct
* 0.306: Incorrect
* 0.4: Incorrect
